short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hide YouTube videos from channels not on the whitelist.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Whitelist YouTube channels for you or your kids to not be tempted to watch unnecessary stuff. Paste channel list in form of one per line links to activate.
